title: Mobile-Based Personalized English Vocabulary Acquisition Project

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English vocabulary proficiency and digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies of in-service elementary teachers in designing and utilizing mobile learning tools applicable to actual classroom instruction

learning_goals: Learners acquire over 80% of 100 essential elementary vocabulary items within a week using a mobile app based on PSI (Personalized System of Instruction)
Achieve over 90% participation rates through gamified learning activities
Design and share personalized vocabulary learning strategies through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
